Class HarvestAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Action
      • game.HarvestAction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    edu.monash.fit2099.interfaces.ActionInterface

    public class HarvestAction
extends edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Action
    Special action for Farmer and Player to harvest ripe crops.
    Author:
    Kee Pei Jiin

      • HarvestAction

        public HarvestAction(int xcoord,
                     int ycoord,
                     edu.monash.fit2099.engine.GameMap map)
              throws java.lang.NullPointerException
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        xcoord - x-coordinate of the location which the Farmer/Player will harvest at.
        ycoord - y-coordinate of the location which the Farmer/Player will harvest at.
        map - the map where the action is being carried out
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if xcoord or ycoord argument is out of the range of the map
        java.lang.NullPointerException

    • Method Detail

      • execute

        public java.lang.String execute(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actor actor,
                                edu.monash.fit2099.engine.GameMap map)
                         throws java.lang.NullPointerException
        Harvest the ripe crop to become food. If the actor is Farmer, then the food will drop on the harvest location. If the actor is Player, then the food will be added to the Player's inventory. After the ripe crop has been harvested, the ground becomes Dirt again.
        Specified by:
        execute in class edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Action
        Parameters:
        actor - The actor performing the action.
        map - The map the actor is on.
        Returns:
        A suitable description to display in the UI
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if actor or map argument is null
        See Also:
        Action.execute(Actor, GameMap)

      • menuDescription

        public java.lang.String menuDescription(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actor actor)
                                 throws java.lang.NullPointerException
        Describe the action in a format suitable for displaying in the menu.
        Specified by:
        menuDescription in class edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Action
        Parameters:
        actor - The actor performing the action.
        Returns:
        A string, e.g. "Player harvested the crop at location (70, 15)"
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if actor or map argument is null
        See Also:
        Action.menuDescription(Actor)
